navbar.contDesc: Get in touch today and let us help you with your appliance issues.

slider.subTitle: We repair — you enjoy.
slider.title: Appliance broken?

bringToLife.title: We Bring Your Appliances Back to Life
bringToLife.desc: Don’t let a broken appliance disrupt your life. RBT-SERWIS offers comprehensive repair solutions for all major brands and models. With transparent pricing, easy online booking, and a satisfaction guarantee, you can rest assured your appliance is in good hands.
bringToLife.warrantyDesc: We provide a warranty for all our repairs so you can feel confident.
bringToLife.availabilityDesc: We accept service requests around the clock to fix your appliances when you need it.
bringToLife.qualityDesc: We use only genuine parts and back our repairs with a warranty.

ourServices.title: Comprehensive Appliance Repair Services
ourServices.desc: We provide a full range of repair services for all major household appliances. Whether your fridge is leaking, your oven isn’t heating, or your washing machine is making strange noises — we’ve got the fix.
ourServices.types: We repair all major appliance models

fridgeRepair.title: Refrigerator Repair
fridgeRepair.desc: We diagnose and fix cooling issues, leaks, strange noises, and more to keep your food fresh and safe.

ovenRepair.title: Washing Machine Repair
ovenRepair.desc: From leaks and drainage issues to spin cycle problems — we’ll get your laundry routine back on track.

washerRepair.title: Coffee Machine Repair
washerRepair.desc: We fix brewing issues, leaks, and grinding malfunctions to deliver your perfect cup of coffee.

dryerRepair.title: TV Repair
dryerRepair.desc: Our technicians resolve display, sound, and connection problems to restore your perfect viewing experience.

dishwasherRepair.title: Air Purifier Repair
dishwasherRepair.desc: We restore clean air circulation by fixing filter problems, sensor failures, and more.

microwaveRepair.title: Microwave Repair
microwaveRepair.desc: We repair the power unit, turntable, and other components to restore microwave heating.

kettleRepair.title: Sewing Machine Repair
kettleRepair.desc: We fix thread tension, motor issues, and other malfunctions to get your sewing machine running smoothly again.

acRepair.title: Dishwasher Repair
acRepair.desc: We fix leaks, cleaning issues, and strange noises so your dishes come out sparkling every time.

riceRepair.title: Rice Cooker Repair
riceRepair.desc: To ensure perfect rice every time, we inspect the heating element, timer, and fix any potential issues.

vacuumRepair.title: Vacuum Cleaner Repair
vacuumRepair.desc: Our experts fix suction problems, brush issues, and other malfunctions to restore full cleaning power.

toasterRepair.title: Toaster Repair
toasterRepair.desc: We resolve heating problems, uneven toasting, and jammed mechanisms so you get perfectly toasted bread every time.

blenderRepair.title: Blender Repair
blenderRepair.desc: We fix leaks in the blades, motor, and lid to ensure your smoothies and soups blend smoothly and evenly.

hero.title: Reliable and Experienced Appliance Repair Team
hero.subtitle: Professional appliance repairs at fair prices. Fast diagnostics, quality service, and parts for all major brands. Guaranteed work and transparent terms — no hidden fees.

features.certifiedDesc: Our specialists can diagnose and repair any household appliance.
features.localDesc: Hundreds of satisfied customers trust us for our professionalism, punctuality, and honest service.
features.pricingDesc: No hidden fees. We provide an accurate estimate before any work begins.
features.promptDesc: We value your time and offer same-day or next-day repairs.

we_bring_appliances_back: We Bring Your Appliances Back to Life
we_provide_comprehensive_repair: Don’t let a faulty appliance disrupt your routine. RBS-SERWIS provides comprehensive repairs for all major brands and models. Transparent pricing, convenient online booking, and a satisfaction guarantee — your appliances are in good hands.
warranties_description: Every repair comes with an official warranty — so you know exactly what you’re paying for and what to expect.
service_24_7_description: Submit a request anytime — we’ll contact you during the next available work window and resolve the issue quickly.
convenient_booking_description: Fill out a short form on our website or choose a convenient callback time — no long waits or complicated steps.
quality_parts_description: We use only genuine parts and strictly follow manufacturer standards — your appliance will work like new.
featured_description: Discover how Applicare helps thousands of families with appliance repairs. Browse our recent projects to see the quality and professionalism behind our services.
weAre: We’re Your All-in-One Appliance Repair Solution

pp.this_privacy_policy: This Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as the 'Policy') governs the collection, use, storage, and disclosure of information provided by users of web applications and services.
pp.committed_to_maintaining: RBS-SERWIS is committed to ensuring the confidentiality and protection of personal data in compliance with applicable laws, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), and other international standards.
pp.company_may_collect: We may collect the following types of data:
pp.provided_voluntarily: Personal data: Name, email address, phone number, and other data voluntarily provided by the user through forms.
pp.technical_data: Technical data: IP address, device type, browser data, operating system, and website behavior.
pp.cookie: Cookies: To enhance the user experience and analyze application performance.
pp.data_collected: Data is collected for the following purposes:
pp.improving_the_quality: Improving the quality of web applications and services.
pp.stores_personal: We store personal data only for the time necessary to fulfill the purposes of its processing and in accordance with the user's country's legislation. After achieving the purposes, the data is deleted or anonymized.
pp.does_not_transfer_data: The company does not transfer personal data to third parties, except in the following cases:
pp.engaging_service_providers: When engaging third-party service providers (e.g., hosting, analytics) who are obligated to maintain data confidentiality.
pp.data_transfer_countries: In case of data transfer to other countries, we ensure compliance with international privacy standards.
pp.depending_on_laws: Depending on the legislation of their country of residence, users may have the following rights:
pp.request_correction: Request correction or deletion of data.
pp.exercise_rights: To exercise their rights, users may contact us using the details provided on the website.
pp.company_takes_measures: We take technical and organizational measures to ensure data security, including:
pp.restricting_access: Restricting access to data to authorized employees only.
pp.company_reserves_right: We reserve the right to amend this Policy. Updates are published on the Company's official website. Users are encouraged to periodically check for changes.
pp.company_operates: We operate in accordance with international privacy standards and process data in compliance with the laws of the countries where users are located. For cross-border data transfers, mechanisms ensuring data protection, such as Standard Contractual Clauses, are used.
pp.have_any_questions: If you have any questions or inquiries related to this Policy, you can contact us using the details provided on the website.
